thread.title: Here's how you can watch Royals-Blue Jays ALCS Game 5
thread.title_full: Here's how you can watch Royals-Blue Jays ALCS Game 5 | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: reviewjournal.com
title: Here's how you can watch Royals-Blue Jays ALCS Game 5
text:
The American League Championship Series between the Kansas City Royals and the Toronto Blue Jays continues today with Game 5 at Rogers Centre in Toronto. The Royals lead the series 3-1.
Here's what you need to know to catch the game.
Time: 1:07 p.m. PDT
TV: Fox Sports 1 (Cox 329, DirecTV 219)
Online: MLB.com (subscription required)
Schedule through Game 7 (all times PDT):
Game 6 (if necessary) : Blue Jays at Royals — Friday, Oct. 23, 5:07 p.m. — Fox Sports 1
Game 7 (if necessary) : Blue Jays at Royals — Saturday, Oct. 24, 5:07 p.m. — Fox Sports 1
Here's how you can watch... Here's how you can watch...
